title: Sammy The Not So Scary Snake Finds a Friend
description: Sammy the snake lives in a splendid and beautiful rainforest. But because he is so big and mean looking none of the other animals want to be friends with him.But inside he is very kind and friendly. He tries talking to a bird and a rabbit but they don't want to be his friend because of how he looks. Then he slithers crying through the rainforest and meets Mr.Elephant. Who says that he saw another snake also looking for a friend slither by...
author: Jonathan Vasilyev
